items.headline: SheetSQL
points: A SQL engine letting users store data and run SQL Query in Google Sheet

items.headline: Eth Payroll
points: A trustless payroll system built on Ethereum
A full stack Dapp development course based on Eth Payroll project

items.headline: Micro Subscription
points: A pay per use subscription solution for cloud service based on micropayment and onchain oracle

items.headline: Open Source Projects
points: Actively contribute to open source projects on Github including Zappa, vectorious, and ember addons

items.title: Senior Software Engineer
details: Designed and Implemented state channel and cEconomy smart contracts
Architected and developed a sidechain system to guard channel state
Built a web client to interact with cEconomy smart contracts

items.title: Software Engineer
details: Developed and released an open source analysis report framework Navi
Built and enhanced an internal product KPI analysis platform

items.title: Software Engineer
details: Created policy and network topology manager for intent-based networking
Migrated Veriflow web client from Backbone to Marionette, and eventually landed Vue
Profiled, analyzed and optimized client and web service performance

items.title: Software Engineer Intern
details: Built an image gallery and next-generation work chat for Evernote web client
Enhanced search view and notebook sharing experience on Evernote web client

items.title: Theory-based Causal Modeling Toolkit for Big Data Applications
points: Designed and built a web application to construct causal models

items.title: Network at the Speed of Light
items.supervisor: Mo Dong, Ankit Singla, Brighten Godfrey
points: Integrated PCC, a network congestion control algorithm, into QUIC protocol
Developed a Chrome extension for Internet speed measurement
